settings.duplicates_heading: At lest one course you are trying to import is a duplicate of already existing one.

tour.hello_desc: yet-unnamed-text-learning-app is an app designed to help you with learning long sentences of text. You can create a course with the text you want to learn and memorize it with help of our simple exercises. If you haven't created a course yet, use the {0} icon on the top to do so.
tour.sessions_desc: Clicking on the ‘Learn’ button stars a new learning session. Each session consists of a couple of exercises (by default it's 15, but you can change the amount in Settings) designed to help you remember the text. There are three kinds of exercises:
tour.sessions_exercise1: in ordering exercises you are provided with a list of words or longer parts of the text. Your task is to put them in the order they appear in the text,
tour.sessions_exercise2: in selecting exercises you are provided with incomplete excerpt of the text. Your task is to select the missing parts from the bottom. To make the exercise harder, there are extra words not appearing in the excerpt,
tour.sessions_exercise3: in writing exercises you are provided with incomplete excerpt of the text. Your task is to write the missing words in the correct place.
tour.settings_desc: This app contains a dark mode you can switch in the settings tab. You can also import a copy of courses from another device or export one. Have I mentioned you can export a single course when you click on a {0} icon?
